import { Component, HostListener, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { Anime, StatusAnime, User } from 'src/app/interfaces';
import { StatusService } from 'src/app/services/status.service';
import { TokenService } from 'src/app/services/token.service';
import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service';
import { AnimeService } from '../../services/anime.service';
import { ModalserviceService } from '../../services/modalservice.service';
import { RatingService } from '../../services/rating.service';
import { RatingAnime } from '../../interfaces';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-anime',
  templateUrl: './anime.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./anime.component.scss']
})
export class AnimeComponent implements OnInit {

  public windowScrolled = false;
  public animes: Anime[];
  p: number = 1;
  public status: StatusAnime
  public rating: RatingAnime
  public user: User;
  public anime: Anime = {
    title: "",
    rating: 0,
    picture: "",
    status: "",
    animeSeason: { season: "", year: 0 },
    episodes: 0,
    synonyms: [],
    tags: [],
    type: ""
  };
  public userId: string;
  constructor(private userService: UserService, private animeService: AnimeService, private tokenService: TokenService, private ratingService: RatingService, private modalService: ModalserviceService, private statusService: StatusService) { }

  ngOnInit(): void {
    this.findAllAnimes();
    this.findUser();
  }

  @HostListener('window:scroll', [])
  onWindowScroll(): void {
    if (
      window.pageYOffset ||
      document.documentElement.scrollTop ||
      document.body.scrollTop > 100
    ) {
      this.windowScrolled = true;
    } else if (
      (this.windowScrolled && window.pageYOffset) ||
      document.documentElement.scrollTop ||
      document.body.scrollTop < 10
    ) {
      this.windowScrolled = false;
    }
  }

  scrollToTop(): void {
    (function smoothscroll() {
      var currentScroll =
        document.documentElement.scrollTop || document.body.scrollTop;
      if (currentScroll > 0) {
        window.requestAnimationFrame(smoothscroll);
        window.scrollTo(0, currentScroll - currentScroll / 8);
      }
    })();
  }

  filterAnime(text: string) {
    console.log(text);
    this.animeService.sortAnimes(text).subscribe(resp => {
      console.log(text);
      this.animes = resp.animes;
    });
  }

  findAllAnimes() {
    this.animeService.findAllAnimes().subscribe(resp => {
      this.animes = resp.animes;
    })
  }

  findUser() {
    this.userId = localStorage.getItem('user');
    this.userService.findUserById(this.userId).subscribe(res => {
      this.user = res.user;
    });
  }

  logout() {
    this.tokenService.logout();
  }

  initializeStatusAndRating() {
    this.status = {
      animeId: this.anime._id,
      userId: localStorage.getItem("user")
    }
    this.rating = {
      animeId: this.anime._id,
      userId: localStorage.getItem("user")
    }
    this.statusService.checkStatus(this.status).subscribe(resp => {
      if (resp.anime) {
        this.anime.statusUser = resp.anime.status
        this.ratingService.checkRating(this.rating).subscribe(resp => {
          if (resp.anime) {
            this.anime.ratingUser = resp.anime.rating
            this.modalService.openCloseModalAnime();
          } else {
            this.anime.ratingUser = 0;
            this.modalService.openCloseModalAnime();
          }
        })
      } else {
        this.anime.statusUser = ""
        this.ratingService.checkRating(this.rating).subscribe(resp => {
          if (resp.anime) {
            this.anime.ratingUser = resp.anime.rating
            this.modalService.openCloseModalAnime();
          } else {
            this.anime.ratingUser = 0;
            this.modalService.openCloseModalAnime();
          }
        })
      }

    }, err => {

    })
  }

  editAnime(anime?: Anime) {
    if (this.user) {
      this.anime = { ...anime }
      this.initializeStatusAndRating();
    }
  }
}

<html>
<div>

  <app-animemodal [anime]="anime" (modalClose)="editAnime()"> </app-animemodal>

    </a>
  </div>
  <div class="container list">
    <div class="d-flex justify-content-end">
    <form class="form-inline mb-2">
      <input #text (keyup)="filterAnime(text.value)" class="form-control mr-sm-2" type="search" placeholder="Search"
        aria-label="Search">
    </form>
  </div>
    <div class="card mb-3 fondo" style="max-width: auto;" [ngStyle]="userId? {'cursor':'pointer'}:{'cursor':'normal'} " *ngFor="let anime of animes | paginate: { itemsPerPage: 20, currentPage: p } " (click)="editAnime(anime)">
      <div class="row no-gutters series">
        <div class="col-md-1">
          <img src="{{anime.picture | noImage}}" class="card-img img-thumbnail" alt="...">
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-11">
          <div class="card-body">
            <h4 class="card-title">{{anime.title}}<small class="icon">  {{anime.rating | number:'.1-1'}}<i class="fas fa-star"></i></small></h4>
            <p class="card-text season">{{anime.animeSeason.season | noSeason }} | {{anime.animeSeason.year | noYear}}</p>
            <p class="card-text ep">{{anime.episodes}} episode/s</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <pagination-controls class="pagination" (pageChange)="p = $event"></pagination-controls>
  </div>
  <app-navfooter></app-navfooter>
  <button class="btn-float btn-float__top" [ngClass]="{ 'show-scrollTop': windowScrolled }" *ngIf="windowScrolled"
  (click)="scrollToTop()">
  <i class="fas fa-arrow-up"></i>
</button>
</div>

</html>
